Identify.oai:repositoryName: UC Los Angeles, Special Collections, Young Research Library: Southern California Cadastral and Tract Maps Collection

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Map of the city of Long Beach, Los Angeles County, California

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: I map ; 27 x 33 cm. on sheet 37 x 35.5 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: "Compiled from official records and from other reliable data by C. L. Goucher, C.E."
"American Eng. Co., L.A."
On verso: "Bird's eye view of Long Beach, Cal." and inset, "Map of the Southern Pacific Company's roads in Southern California"
Relief on inset shown by hachures

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: California Cultures
Southern California cadastral and tract maps collection

mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by copyright beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. UC Regents
Department of Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, U.C. Los Angeles

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Plan of Redondo Beach, Los Angeles County, California

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : col. ; 32 x 49.5 cm. on sheet 36 x 53 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: "Designed and drawn under the direction of W.M. Ham. Hall, Consulting Civil Engineer. George Sandow, draughtsman."
Caption in lower left corner: "Redondo Beach Co., capital: $3,000,000"
Caption on verso: "The gem of the continent" above large pictorial inset of Hotel Redondo, Los Angeles County, Cal., by Lith Britton & Rey, S.F
Verso has promotional real estate material
Current and future cable railway lines indicated

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: California Cultures

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Lands of the Hemet Land Company in San Jacinto Valley situated in sections

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : 31.5 x 25 cm. on sheet 48.5 x 51.5 cm. originally folded to 24 x 10.5 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: Panel title: Hemet and the adjacent lands of the Hemet Land Co., Riverside County, Cal
Includes ancillary map: "Map of Los Angeles, Riverside, San Bernardino, San Diego & Orange Counties"
Includes lots of real estate promotional text and illustrations

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Towner Terrace : Santa Monica's close in subdivision where opportunity knocks the loudest, where your future is assured

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map ; 34.5 x 36 cm. on sheet 41 x 54 cm. originally folded to 21 x 9 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: Inset: Bird's-eye-view of Santa Monica
All lots are numbered and those that are unavailable are marked "sold" in red
Verso is full of promotional real estate text and illustrations
Map is oriented southeast
UCLA copy: "$500.00 to 2,500.00" hand written below title

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: California Cultures
Southern California cadastral and tract maps collection

mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by copyright beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Map of Los Angeles

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : some col. ; 70 x 68 cm. on sheet 76 x 71 cm. originally folded to 12.5 x 7.5 cm. and tipped into cover 13.5 x 8.5 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: Cover title
Caption above map: "Los Angeles Investment Company, largest real estate and investment company in Western America and largest co-operative building company in the world"
"Correct to Aug. 15, 1913"
Key to map of LA Investment Company properties. Numbered parcels are outlined in red
Verso has an index to Los Angeles streets

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: California Cultures
Southern California cadastral and tract maps collection

mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by copyright beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Sunnymead Orchard Tract, Riverside County, California

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map ; 12 x 18.5 cm. on sheet 46 x 38 cm. originally folded to 23 x 9.5 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: Caption below map title: "The very finest citrus and deciduous fruit land"
Panel title: "Sunnymead Orchard Tract, in the foothills east of Riverside and southwest of Redlands, California"
Full of illustrations and text promoting real estate opportunities offered by the Sunnymead Orchard Company
Small ancillary map (on back panel when folded) locating Sunnymead in Southern Califronia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: California Cultures

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Map of Rancho La Ballona, Centinela Rancho, Inglewood, Sausal Redondo Rancho, Los Angeles Trust Co. Land, Walnut and Bean Land Co. and Playa del Mar

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : blueprint ; 33.5 x 48.5 cm. on sheet 40 x 55 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: Additional properties identified by hand in red ink
Relief shown by hachures
Boundaries are over drawn in red and yellow

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: California Cultures
Southern California cadastral and tract maps collection

mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Material in public domain. No restrictions on use

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Palisades

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : blue print ; 35.5 x 44 cm. on sheet 37 x 49 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: Covers parts of present day Brentwood, Pacific Palisades, and West Los Angeles as well as Santa Monica
Boundaries of Rancho San Vicente in red
All tracts are identified and numbered, with a few shaded in red

UCLA copy has hand written in the bottom right corner: "Street work $85.00 a lot for 50 ft. and payment for same to extend over period of 10 years. Price $800.00 a lot 50 x 150 to alley, not incl. street work or $18.00 to 20 a foot with improvements"

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: California Cultures
Southern California cadastral and tract maps collection

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Map of the McDonald Tract, Rancho San Pedro, Los Angeles Co., Cal,

mods:physicalDescription.mods:extent: 1 map : 49 x 67 cm. on sheet 53 x 71 cm

mods:mods.mods:note: "As subdivided by H.H. Boyce & C.J. Richards, by E.T. Wright"
The Rancho covered the present day areas of San Pedro, Dominguez Hills and other neighboring locations
